maqras.text: Ana ngajukumanyilila pandema jaichikoposyedwa yaili m’malembe
Nikwisa kwilochesya papaswela yaili m’mitima
Chisimu lyele lisikulyo M’mbuje gwao (Allah) tachamanya abali syosope (syakwamba yawapanganyaga wanganyao)
Chagunda ntima (Kiyama)
Ana chagunda ntima nichichi
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya chagunda ntima
Lyele ni lisiku (lya Kiyama) lyachachiwa wandu (sakalaalii!) mpela mapuluputwa gakusapalala
Nombe matumbi gachiwa (nkuwululuka) mpela litonji lyetyosye mbele
Sano mundu jwachiukasitope n'diingo wakwe (wa yambone, nikwepepala yakusakala)
Basi jwalakwejo takawe mu ndamo jakusengwasya
Nambo mundu jwachiukajepepale n'dingo wakwe (wa yambone, ni kusitopa yakusakala)
Basi liuto lyakwe ni ku Hawiya
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya jele (Hawiya)
Wele ni Moto Wakoocha nnope
Kumpele chipaka kusonganganya (ya duniya mwampikisano kuleka ganisya ya Akhera)
Mpaka nkwikanila kwaula ku malembe (n'di m'bwile)
Ngwamba! Chinchiika kumanyilila
Soni ngwamba! Chinchiika kumanyilila
Ngwamba! Ingawe mwamanyililaga umanyilisi usyesyene (nga nganin'jijilikaga ni ya duniya)
Chisimu chene chinkauone Moto Waukali
Soni chinkauone kusyene ni liso lyakusimichisya
Soni lyele lisikulyo tinkawusyidwe kusyene ya chindimba (chawampele pa duniya)
Ngujilumbila ndawi
Chisimu chene mundu ali nchasiko (ni kupelelwa)
Ikaweje awala waakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone, ni kulimbisyanaga ya (kuya ichindu) yakuona, ni kulimbisyanaga soni yakupilila
Ipotesi ni yakwe jwalijose jwakwasogoda ni kwachembulusya wandu mwakwamumunya
Ajula jwaachisonganganyisye chipanje nikuchiwalanjilaga (ndema ni katema)
Akuganichisya kuti chipanje chakwecho chichintendekasye kuwa jwandamo
Ngwamba! Chisimu chene takaponyedwe ku Hutwama
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Hutwama
Wele ni Moto wa Allah wachikolelele (wakuteketulanya chilichose chakuponyedwamo)
Awula wachiuwa nkukwelela ku mitima
Chisimu walakweo uchaunichila ni kwaakutika wanganyao (kwakusowa pakopochela)
(Chachiwa) m’makongwa getandaliche chanchilewu (mwanti ngasakombola kupuluputa)
Ana nganinyyiona yawatite Ambuje wenu (Allah) pakwajonanga achinsyene ndembo (wawayikaga kugumula Likaaba)
Ana nganagatenda malindi gao kuwa gakusokonechela
Ni watumichisye wanganyao ijuni mikutula-mikutula
Yaliji nkwaasoma ni maganga gelongo lyejoche (ni moto wa ku Jahannama)
Niwatesile kuwa mpela masapi gagalilidwe (ni inyama ni kulukulidwa)
(Wajonasile achinsyene ndembo) kuti ajendelechele Makuraishi
Panyendele jao jamaulendo ga chuku (kuja ku Yemeni) ni chawu (kuja ku Shami kumalonda mwantunjelele)
Basi an'galagatileje M'mbuje jwa aji Nyumba (ja Likaaba)
Ajula jwawapele yakulya ligongo lyasala, ni kwawambasya ku woga
Ana mum'bweni ajula jwaakukanila ya malipilo (ga pa Kiyama)
Basi jwele ni ajula jwaakuntutanga mwanache jwawina
Soni jwangachisya yagaliisya masikini
Basi ipotesi niyao wandu wakuswaliji
Awala wanya waakuwa ali nkusikwanjila swala syao
Awala wanya waakuwa ali nkutenda ndola
Ni akuwa soni ali nkukanya yaakamuchisya (pannango, mpela liwago, chipula, lituli ni yine)
Chisimu Uwwe tumpele (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) Kauthara (lusulo lwa ku Mbepo)
Basi mwaswalilani Ambuje wenu (Allah) nikusikita (inyama yakur’bani yakupelechela mbepesi Kukwakwe ngawaga kwa akumasoka)
Chisimu jwaakum'benga mmwejo ni jwali jwakatika (upile wakwe ni kusalidwa kwakwe)
Jilani: “E jenumanja achimakafili!”
“Ngangalagatila chinkuchigalagatila (kunneka Allah).”
“Nombe wanganyammwe nganim'ba mun'galagatile (Allah) jwangun'galagatila (kutendaga n'di mu ukafili pemo).”
“Nombe une soni nganimba nachigalagatile cham'bele n'di nkuchigalagatila wanganyammwe.”
“Nombe wanganyammwe nganim'ba mun'galagatile (Allah) jwangun'galagatila (kutendaga n'di mu ukafili pemo).”
“Jenumanja nkwete dini jenu (jagalagatila isanamu) une none ngwete dini jangu (jakun’galagatila Allah).”
Ndema jachiyiche chikulupusyo cha Allah ni kuwugula (Maaka kuwa m’makono mwa Asilamu)
Ni kwaona mmwejo wandu ali nkwinjila mu dini ja Allah mikutula-mikutula
Basi (jele ndemajo) luswejesyani lumbili lwa Ambuje wenu, ni kwawenda chikululuko. Chisimu Walakweo awele Wakupochela nnope toba
Gajonasiche makono ganagawili ga Abu Lahabi, nombe nao ajonasiche
Ngaija kwakamuchisya ipanje yao atamuno yawapanganyisye (mpela wanache wawaweleche)
Takajinjile ku Moto waukwete malamba (gakulapuka)
Niwankwao wakwe wawaliji nkutwichila sasu (syamiwa nikuntejelaga Muhammadi ﷺ mwakupita)
Nnukosi mwao (wele wakongweo) chimukawe mwana litondolo lyamiwamiwa (lyakwalagachisya nalyo)
Jilani: “Jwalakwe ni Allah Jumpepe.”
“Allah pe ni jwakun'jegama.”
“Nganaweleka soni nganawelechedwa.”
“Soni nganakola jwakulanda najo ata jumo.”
Jilani: “Ngulijuya mwa M’mbuje jwa kumasikusiku.”
“Ku yakusakala yawaigumbile.”
“Ni ku yakusakala yachilo ndema jachikwinjila chipi.”
“Ni ku yakusakala ya (asawi) waakupepela mu iwundo (pakuloga).”
“Ni ku yakusakala ya jwalitima ndema jajukutenda litima.”
Jilani: “Ngulijuya mwa M'mbuje jwa wandu.”
“Nchimwene jwa wandu.”
“Nnungu jwa wandu.”
“Ku yakusakala ya nkusongona (pakuunyenjelela ntima yakusakala), jwakuujiilila ni kuliisisa (naga nsyene ntimao juli junkolasile Allah).”
“Ajula jwaakusongonaga m’mitima mwa wandu.”
“Jwakuumila m’majini ni mu wandu.”
